abstract: The Precision Cardiology Laboratory is a joint effort between the Broad Institute and Bayer AG. This work was supported by the Fondation Leducq (14CVD01), and by grants from the National Institutes of Health to Dr. Ellinor (1RO1HL092577, R01HL128914, K24HL105780), Dr. Tucker (5K01HL140187) and Dr. Margulies (1R01HL105993), as well as the Klarman Cell Observatory and the Manton Foundation (to Dr. Regev). This work was also supported by a grant from the American Heart Association Strategically Focused Research Networks to Dr. Ellinor (18SFRN34110082).
author: Amer-Denis Akkad; Gökcen Eraslan; Alessandro Arduini; Kenneth C Bedi; Patrick T Ellinor; Mark Chaffin; Christian M Stegmann; Irinna Papangeli; Kenneth B Margulies; Human Cell Atlas Lung Biological Network; Nathan R Tucker; Roby Bhattacharyya; Christoph Muus; Sikander Hayat
title: Myocyte Specific Upregulation of ACE2 in Cardiovascular Disease: Implications for SARS-CoV-2 mediated myocarditis

funding.funding-statement: Dr Ellinor is supported by a grant from Bayer AG to the Broad Institute focused on the genetics and therapeutics of cardiovascular diseases
Dr Margulies has research grant funding from Sanofi-Aventis, USA and has also served on advisory boards for MyoKardia and Pfizer

award-group.funding-source: Klarman Cell Observatory and the Manton Foundation
